title: Mac Client Crashes in the loading screen
body:
I have a MacBook Pro i just updated the game till the llmost recent patch and everything is fine the game starts and we choose the champions but the actual game itself never starts, it never lets me into the map, whenever the loading reaches 100% or even before that a message shows up saying "You have disconnected, check your network and try again" though my internet is working just fine and the ping is around 100.
Now i was AFK in two games i couldn't enter, please help.
Thanks

replies.body: I have been getting a black screen instead of a loading screen . also on a mac pro.

It sounds like your network isn't able to establish a connection to the game server, and giving you the disconnect error.  I recommend going through the steps in our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  Be sure to select the Mac box for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
